model.manager

Class LivraisonManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.manager.LivraisonManager

  • public class LivraisonManager
extends java.lang.Object
    LivraisonManager has the role to manage all the data related to the "livraisons". It stores most of the mathematics results and it's a bridge between the controller and the model.
    Author:
    Vadim Caen, Maria Etegan, Anthony Faraut, Ludmila Danilescu, Marco Montalto, Bernardo Rittmeyer

    • Constructor Detail

      • LivraisonManager

        public LivraisonManager(PlanManager planManager,
                Controller controller)
        Class constructor specifying a Controller and a PlanManager
        Parameters:
        planManager - is the PlanManager, necessary as LivraisonManager needs the plan data.
        controller - is the Controller, to advise the system when operations are concluded.

    • Method Detail

      • loadDemandeLivraisonsXML

        public void loadDemandeLivraisonsXML(java.io.File fileXML)
                              throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        This method loads a "demande de livraisons" from a xml file, passing through the XMLLoader class, and stores the result to the attributes mDemandeLivraisons. An exception is cached if there's a problem opening or reading the file.
        Parameters:
        fileXML - is a xml File, which contains all the informations concerning a "demande de livraisons"
        Throws:
        NullPointException() - if file is empty
        java.lang.NullPointerException

        Parameters:
        adresseNouvelleLivraison - is the Noeud where the new delivery will be performed
        adresseLivraisonPrecedente - is the Noeud of the previous delivery
        idClient - is the client id for the new shipping
